oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leroy Peyton Cox and Margaret Wheeler Cox photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Cpl. Leroy Peyton Cox, Co. I, 9th Ky. Inf. Regt., USA, and his wife, Margaret Wheeler Cox. Leroy Peyton Cox was born June 20, 1841, in Smith County, Tennessee. He was the son of Duncan and Elizabeth Cox. He enlisted on November 21, 1861, and was promoted to corporal on August 1, 1864. According to his service records, Cox was 5 feet, 5 inches tall. He had a dark complexion with grey eyes and black hair. Cox died Nov. 30, 1932, in Macon County, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cox, Leroy Peyton; Cox, Margaret Wheeler
